item.title: Personal Cybersecurity Checklist
item.description: HOW TO STAY SECURE IN DANGEROUS TIMES (2021 EDITION) This guide has few areas, where one can improve his security standards. HUMAN FACTOR each protection can be broken by human and cause of human mistake verify who are you talking to, callback to your bank to check if it’s their employee asking suspicious questions your friend on Facebook needs some money urgently, call his mobile and confirm it your real inbox can also be a target of attack, someone can try to trick you into some payment end-user education is a must in your company VPN can make tracking you harder, assuming provider itself is not some malicious actor allows to bypass restrictions like geographic or law ones if you’re using hotspot, encrypts your traffic so other cannot spy on you in this public network do not trust completely VPN providers, they aren’t always honest about “zero logs policy” and [https://techcrunch.

item.title: Workspace Environment
item.description: Will write about my workspace, tools, terminal and so on. CLI Applications That You Should Know! usql - is a universal command-line interface for PostgreSQL, MySQL, Oracle Database, SQLite3, Microsoft SQL Server, and many other databases including NoSQL and non-relational databases! exa - exa is a modern replacement for the venerable file-listing command-line program ls that ships with Unix and Linux operating systems, giving it more features and better defaults
